post_content:
Looking to trade this T206 Bresnahan Portrait Sovereign 350 for another low grade T206 HOF'er, in an SGC Holder

Happy to downgrade to a cheaper back. SGC 1 preferred. 

If you want to buy it, $110 PPFF including shipping

Matt

BUMP

Still looking for a trade, any low grade HOF’er- maybe raw, but prefer SGC 1, any back is fine. 

If you want to buy it, I’ll sell it at cost - $110 including shipping PPFF

Matt

Any traders out there?

Will certainly look at low ball deals, open to a raw HOF’er or banged up slabbed version.

Open to offers FS as well!

Want to find a new home for Bresnahan- I'll go $110 for anyone interested!

Or trade for a low grade HOF
